testing.name: The development of Ukrainian culture in the late nineteenth - early twentieth century.

question.text: How many universities acted on Ukrainian lands in the early twentieth century.?
Who is the founder of Ukrainian classical music?
When at Western was introduced compulsory primary education?
Which of these universities in the Ukrainian lands was founded in the late nineteenth century.?
What year was established Scientific Society. Shevchenko (Shevchenko Scientific Society), which played the role of the Academy of Sciences of Ukraine?
In that period there was flourishing Ukrainian theater?
Who wrote the opera "Natalka Poltavka", "Taras Bulba", "Aeneid", "goat-dereza"?
